queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-prometheus-node-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-prometheus-node-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-prometheus-node-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/proc' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-prometheus-node-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/proc' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'release-name-prometheus-node-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/sys' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'release-name-prometheus-node-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/sys' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-node-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{node-exporter}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

metadata.name={{release-name-victoria-metrics-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{victoria-metrics-operator}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-test}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{release-name-victoria-metrics-operator-cleanup-hook}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with wildcard RBAC permissions provide excessive rights to the Kubernetes API and should be avoided. The principle of least privilege recommends to specify only the set of needed objects and actions

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-victoria-metrics-operator}}.rules[8].verbs uses wildcards to specify objects or actions

queries.description: Container should not share the host process ID namespace

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.hostPID' should be set to false or undefined

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{grafana-init-sc-datasources}}.volumeMounts.name={{sc-datasources-volume}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.volumeMounts.name={{sc-datasources-volume}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.volumeMounts.name={{storage}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{download-dashboards}}.volumeMounts.name={{config}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.volumeMounts.name={{sc-dashboard-provider}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{download-dashboards}}.volumeMounts.name={{storage}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.query_name: Workload Mounting With Sensitive OS Directory
queries.description: Workload is mounting a volume with sensitive OS Directory

files.actual_value: Workload name 'release-name-prometheus-node-exporter' of kind 'DaemonSet' is mounting a host sensitive OS directory '/' with hostPath

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-victoria-metrics-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{victoria-metrics-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-test}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{release-name-victoria-metrics-operator-cleanup-hook}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-victoria-metrics-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{victoria-metrics-operator}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-victoria-metrics-operator-cleanup-hook}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubectl}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser should be set to a UID >= 10000
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.securityContext.runAsUser is set to a low UID

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-test}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana-sc-dashboard}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{grafana-init-sc-datasources}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-node-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{node-exporter}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-test}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-victoria-metrics-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{victoria-metrics-operator}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-kube-state-metrics}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kube-state-metrics}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{download-dashboards}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{download-dashboards}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

metadata.name={{release-name-kube-state-metrics}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kube-state-metrics}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-victoria-metrics-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{victoria-metrics-operator}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{grafana-init-sc-datasources}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana-sc-dashboard}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-prometheus-node-exporter}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{node-exporter}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-test}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined
metadata.name={{release-name-victoria-metrics-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{victoria-metrics-operator}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=release-name-victoria-metrics-operator.rules.verbs should not contain a wildcard value when metadata.name=release-name-victoria-metrics-operator.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=release-name-victoria-metrics-operator.rules.verbs contains a wildcard value and metadata.name=release-name-victoria-metrics-operator.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.query_name: RBAC Roles with Read Secrets Permissions
queries.description: Roles and ClusterRoles with get/watch/list RBAC permissions on Kubernetes secrets are dangerous and should be avoided. In case of compromise, attackers could abuse these roles to access sensitive data, such as passwords, tokens and keys

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kube-state-metrics}}.rules[22] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-kube-state-metrics}}.rules[22] is granted read access (verbs: list, watch) to Secrets objects

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana-clusterrole}}.rules[0] should not be granted read access to Secrets objects
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana-clusterrole}}.rules[0] is granted read access (verbs: get, watch, list) to Secrets objects

queries.description: Check if Readiness Probe is not configured.

metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana-sc-dashboard}}.readinessProbe should be defined

queries.query_name: Pod or Container Without Security Context
queries.description: A security context defines privilege and access control settings for a Pod or Container

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana-test}}.spec has a security context
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{release-name-grafana-test}}.spec does not have a security context

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubectl has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubectl does not have a security context

files.expected_value: spec.containers.name=release-name-test has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.containers.name=release-name-test does not have a security context

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=victoria-metrics-operator has a security context
files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=victoria-metrics-operator does not have a security context

queries.description: Check if the root container filesystem is not being mounted read-only.

metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{download-dashboards}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana-test}}.spec.containers.name={{release-name-test}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{grafana-sc-dashboard}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-victoria-metrics-operator}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{victoria-metrics-operator}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
metadata.name={{release-name-grafana}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{grafana-init-sc-datasources}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
